blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: thoughts on dans merch email? (in case you dont know: he said "stay tuned to this newsletter for more surprise sales and look...
question: thoughts on dans merch email? (in case you dont know: he said "stay tuned to this newsletter for more surprise sales and look forward to the future" and some people are taking it as him saying theres new merch soon but ?? i dont think thats it) i think hes trying not to get our hopes up but also reassuring us that he will be back at some point
answer: I think whoever wrote the email was just trying to find a way to end it in the most vague and generic way possible (the phrasing is so awkward) because they know that no matter what they say people are going to read far too much into it. I imagine with the hiatus that some of the things they already have in stock aren’t selling as well as they would like, so they are having a sale to try to move them. I think it’s a reach to assume anything about Dan’s future on YouTube or that he is making new merch from what was said and that people are just so desperate for information that they are looking for clues anywhere. I’ll believe Dan is making new content or new merch when he gives me specifics. Until then, my expectations are nonexistent. I will say that I would personally be very disappointed if he came out with new merch without releasing at least two videos first or officially announcing that he is quitting YouTube to be a full-time merch designer.

I think it’s a reach to assume anything about Dan’s future on YouTube or that he is making new merch from what was said and that people are just so desperate for information that they are looking for clues anywhere. I’ll believe Dan is making new content or new merch when he gives me specifics. Until then, my expectations are nonexistent. I will say that I would personally be very disappointed if he came out with new merch without releasing at least two videos first or officially announcing that he is quitting YouTube to be a full-time merch designer.

I imagine with the hiatus that some of the things they already have in stock aren’t selling as well as they would like, so they are having a sale to try to move them. I think it’s a reach to assume anything about Dan’s future on YouTube or that he is making new merch from what was said and that people are just so desperate for information that they are looking for clues anywhere. I’ll believe Dan is making new content or new merch when he gives me specifics. Until then, my expectations are nonexistent. I will say that I would personally be very disappointed if he came out with new merch without releasing at least two videos first or officially announcing that he is quitting YouTube to be a full-time merch designer.
trail.content: I think whoever wrote the email was just trying to find a way to end it in the most vague and generic way possible (the phrasing is so awkward) because they know that no matter what they say people are going to read far too much into it. I imagine with the hiatus that some of the things they already have in stock aren’t selling as well as they would like, so they are having a sale to try to move them. I think it’s a reach to assume anything about Dan’s future on YouTube or that he is making new merch from what was said and that people are just so desperate for information that they are looking for clues anywhere. I’ll believe Dan is making new content or new merch when he gives me specifics. Until then, my expectations are nonexistent. I will say that I would personally be very disappointed if he came out with new merch without releasing at least two videos first or officially announcing that he is quitting YouTube to be a full-time merch designer.
